programme.title: The Disappearance Of: Natalee Holloway
programme.desc: Dave Holloway and a team of investigators pursue a lead that may shed light on his daughter's disappearance, with the goal of obtaining a taped confession and concrete evidence.

programme.title: The Disappearance Of: Natalee Holloway
programme.desc: The sting operation in New Orleans continues as the investigation team begins running out of time to obtain the necessary information from the co-conspirator.

programme.title: The Disappearance Of: Natalee Holloway
programme.desc: TJ and his team head to Aruba to begin phase two of their investigation - attempting to obtain DNA evidence from Natalee's alleged burial site; Dave must convince his informant to go the extra mile.

programme.title: The Disappearance Of: Natalee Holloway
programme.desc: TJ races to the location where the co-conspirator claims he dug up Natalee's remains in 2010; working with the Aruban authorities, they search for DNA that could lead to convicting those involved in Natalee's disappearance.

programme.title: The Disappearance Of: Natalee Holloway
programme.desc: After two years following a lead, the investigators finally have evidence in hand that could answer the 12-year-old mystery of what happened to Natalee Holloway.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Phoenix Coldon
programme.desc: Phoenix Coldon vanishes; investigative reporter, Shawndrea Thomas, and retired deputy Police Chief Joe Delia attempt to unravel the mysterious unsolved case in the hope of finding justice for Phoenix.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Phoenix Coldon
programme.desc: Joe and Shawndrea follow up on a handful of Phoenix sightings since her disappearance and begin to question whether she'd been lured into a new life more dangerous than she could have anticipated; a surprising lead goes to an unexpected locale.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Susan Cox Powell
programme.desc: A young mother in Utah vanishes and the only suspect, her husband, acts suspiciously; Stephanie Bauer examines never-before-seen home video recordings that shed light on the dramatic events surrounding the disappearance of Susan Cox Powell.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A beloved member of the local community is brutally murdered with part of his body apparently taken as a souvenir by the killer; detectives try to make sense of this horrifying crime despite conflicting stories and a possible false confession.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a divorced mother is found murdered in her home, police discover she had an unusual array of people involved in her life.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After an elderly woman comes into a large sum of money, she is attacked; investigators uncover a twisted tale of of addiction, brutality and betrayal.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a missing woman is discovered by a deputy to be murdered in the backyard of her family home, investigators must learn whether the victim was killed by a mysterious driver seen lingering outside the house, or someone unexpected.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A U.S. Navy veteran is brutally beaten to death during a home robbery; to find the killer, police must sift through various lies as several suspects desperately attempt to cover their tracks.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When a schoolteacher is gunned down in public, a known felon's DNA and phone records link him to the crime; however, after investigators arrest the man, they discover the real killer might actually be someone else entirely.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a loving wife and mother is found shot to death in her own bed, the case goes cold for two years until determined detectives set their sights on justice and reveal a murder-for-hire plot.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When young woman's body is found burning in the woods, investigators are left with many questions; they follow a trail of fire, fury, and falsities to get to the truth.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When Kim Allen is found murdered in her home, her estranged and abusive husband is the likely suspect; risky bluff by detectives takes the case in a surprising direction.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: In 1981, a mother vanishes from the Hernando woods and the case goes cold and 33 years later, local detectives take the baton from Kelly and the Cold Justice team only to discover that getting a confession may be the only way to solve the case.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A mother of two disappears after a night out at a local bar in New Mexico; investigators race the clock in the hopes of finding her alive, and are eventually stunned by what they uncover.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A shooting in broad daylight in the city of Waterloo, Iowa leaves two dead; investigators Camarata and Moller follow a trail of bloody footprints to a list of suspects and an unexpected lead from a knowledgeable confidential informant.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: Women are found brutally murdered and panic strikes Baton Rouge; the city suspects a serial killer is on the loose; in an example of police work at its finest, detectives lead investigators to an unlikely suspect hiding a dark secret.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When a hardworking single mother with a history of heart issues is found dead on the front steps of her home, detectives assume she died of natural causes, but as the investigation progresses, it becomes clear foul play was involved.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: In Florida, a devoted mother disappears into the night after tucking her daughter into bed; investigators chase down a trail of leads that include multiple suspects, culminating in a horrifying discovery.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A mother's only hope of finding her missing 20-year-old daughter rests in the hands of a seasoned investigator from the DA's office, who takes on her case after it's been cold for seven years.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a college freshman goes missing without a trace, concerned friends and family talk to police about his last whereabouts; those conversations, however, raise more questions than answers when they point to a potentially deadly love triangle.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A wife returns home to find her husband shot dead, and detectives search for the truth for two years.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: Although a man claims he accidentally shot himself, the crime scene does not corroborate his story, and a love triangle unfolds.
